answers.answer: No - have never taken any of the mentioned drugs.  Thanks for replying - gonna hook up with the VA and see if they can sort the problem.  Wish me luck - will update when I find out - wish I had some idea going in what to expect.  Again, thanks.

question: I have been experiencing lower back pain and tingling/numbness from my hips and ankles.  It occurs if I stand in one place for too long or am on my feet for an extended period of time.  I was standing and watching a parade when I went completely numb to the point of collapsing because I could not feel my feet anymore.  These symptoms have been increasing in freqeuncy as of late.  Some manifestation when I sit for long periods of time - none when I am laying down.  Additionally, I am 325lbs, 6ft tall, and have history of COPD.  Family history of diabetes, "factor 5 clotting syndrome (sisters in family only).  I do not smoke nor do I drink more that two beers a day.
title: Lower Back Pain and Numbness In Legs/Feet
